title: Spiritual Healing
description: The power to heal using spiritual energy. Sub-power of Spiritual Force Manipulation. Variation of Healing and Life-Force Healing. Not to be confused with Chi Healing, Psionic Healing, Soul Healing or Spirit Healing. User can heal oneself and others using spiritual energy. Cellular Activation Curing Disease Detection Healing Soul Healing Internal Bodily Cleansing Limb Reattachment Regenerative Healing Factor Soul Energy Generation Astral Projection Healing Energy Manipulation Life-Force Manipulat
cleaned_text: The power to heal using spiritual energy. Sub-power of [Spiritual Force Manipulation](/wiki/Spiritual_Force_Manipulation). Variation of [Healing](/wiki/Healing) and can heal oneself and others Applications[ - Extensive use may weaken or even damage user physically, mentally and/or spiritually. - Cannot affect users of [Healing Immunity](/wiki/Healing_Immunity). Known Users[ ] - Sebas Tian [Stick](https://marvelcinematicuniverse.fandom.com/wiki/Stick)(Marvel Cinematic Universe) [Iron Fist](https://marvelcinematicuniverse.fandom.com/wiki/Iron_Fist)(Marvel Cinematic Universe) [Restoration](https://dannyphantom.fandom.com/wiki/Restoration)Users (Danny - Medical Ninja (Naruto) - Ryu Hayabusa (Ninja Gaiden) - Lao G (One Piece) - Orihime Inoue (Bleach) - Yhwach (Bleach) - Minoru Kamiya (Yu Yu Hakusho) - Squad Soul Dragon ball hero's) - Sonya Karp - St. Vladimir
